Detailed Description

ConfigureDialog class is a Configuration GUI for "Particle" sensor board.

ConfigureDialog class generates a Dialog box when the "Configure Particle" button is clicked on the Framework GUI.

Member Function Documentation

void ConfigureDialog.btnCancel_actionPerformed (  ActionEvent  e  ) 
 

Exits the configuration dialog by hiding it.

This method is called when the Cancel button on the GUI is clicked. It exits the dialog by hiding it.

Parameters:
e as an ActionEvent object. This parameter is never used.

Initializes the GUI.

This method is called by the Framework constructor to contruct the GUI
